Class CLI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLI.CLI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Client, ServerToClientManager
public class CLI
extends java.lang.Object
implements Client, ServerToClientManager

    private int userChoice​(int choicesListSize)
    this method is used to reduce the duplication of code in this class, because when the user have to select his choice this class control that the number is in the range that goes from 0 to the number of elements in the list of choices so this method only need the size of the list.

    • userChoice

      private int userChoice​(int choicesListSize)
      this method is used to reduce the duplication of code in this class, because when the user have to select his choice this class control that the number is in the range that goes from 0 to the number of elements in the list of choices so this method only need the size of the list.
      Parameters:
      choicesListSize - the upper limit of the range, that correspond to the size of the choices list
      Returns:
      the selected index

    • challengerChoice

      private int challengerChoice​(int choicesListSize)
      this method is dedicated to the challenger because the event of the challenger are different to display in CLI
      Parameters:
      choicesListSize - number of possible choice to select
      Returns:
      the number chosen by the challenger

    • isValidIP

      private boolean isValidIP​(java.lang.String ip)
      this method control the validity of the ip address
      Parameters:
      ip - the ip that will be verified
      Returns:
      true if the ip address is valid, false in case the ip is invalid
